[{"url": "https://github.com/scalacenter/GoogleSummerOfCode", "title": "Ideas list for GSoC 2025 mentored by Scala Center - GitHub", "content": "| Expected Outcome | Fundamental features of the cyfra library should run on Scala Native and make it possible to build efficient real-time rendering and data processing applications. | Link to Project | https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala | | Brief Description | This project aims to develop Bazel build rules for Scala.js and Scala Native, enabling efficient and reproducible builds for both platforms. | Expected Outcome | Functional and well-documented Bazel rules that allow compiling, testing, and packaging Scala.js and Scala Native projects. | Brief Description | This project aims to implement incremental optimization for Scala Native’s Intermediate Representation (IR), improving compilation speed by reusing results from previous compilation runs instead of optimizing the entire program from scratch.", "score": 0.04177788, "raw_content": null}, {"url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/davith", "title": "David Smith - San Francisco Bay Area | Professional Profile | LinkedIn", "content": "David Smith
Principal Design Engineer, at NVIDIA
San Francisco Bay Area
500 connections, 702 followers


About
Director of IP Development at Intel/PSG.

I am part of the implementation team.  In implementation my roles are to: 
- Managing cross-functional teams relating to circuit design, logic and  physical design.   
- Working closely with Marketing, reviewing IP Vendor road-maps.
- Collaborating with Technology, Packaging  and Signal Integrity teams to minimize PPA of IPs.

Specialties:  

DDR Memory interfaces: [DDR5, LPDDR4/LPDDR4x]
 Video/Sensor IO interfaces: ( MIPI-DPHY/MIPI-CPHY, LVDS ) 
Chip 2 Chip interfaces:  (Interposer interfaces, Wide IO interfaces) 





Experience
Principal Design Engineer
[NVIDIA](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nvidia/)  
August 2023 - Present
Santa Clara, California, United States
None


Education
UCLA
Bachelor's degree, Electrical Engineering  with Computer Science (EECS)
None - 2000
None", "score": 0.8991304, "raw_content": null}, {"url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-smith-43728213", "title": "David Smith - Robinson Helicopter Company | LinkedIn", "content": "David Smith
President and CEO at Robinson Helicopter Company| Delivering Accessible, Efficient, and Safe Crewed and Uncrewed Helicopters
Torrance
500 connections, 9097 followers


About
As Chief Executive Officer of Robinson Helicopter Company, I lead our employees as we develop and produce cost-effective, efficient, and safe helicopters for customers all over the world. I love helping teams grow and improve performance in engineering and manufacturing companies, especially in the aerospace industry, where I have a proven track record of delivering results and driving innovation.

Prior to joining Robinson Helicopter Company in March 2023, I held leadership positions at Bell Flight and TRU Simulation + Training, where I successfully executed cost restructuring measures, improved business performance, and helped to drive the next generation of manufacturing operations. I am passionate about supporting non-profits and charitable efforts to help our veterans, develop tomorrow's leaders, and grow the American manufacturing industrial base. I am an Eagle Scout and believe strongly in the Boy Scout Oath and Law.


Experience
President and CEO
[Robinson Helicopter Company](https://www.linkedin.com/company/robinson-helicopter-company/)  
February 2024 - Present
Torrance, California, United States
We build the future of aviation. We have the largest distribution and service network in the helicopter industry with over 400 dealers and service centers around the world.  I have the privilege of leading our 1250+ employees as we use this amazing foundation of 50 years and build the aircraft and technology of the future. Come join us as we help the world Climb Higher.


Education
Massachusetts Institute of Technology
BS, Aeronautics and Astronautics
2001 - 2005
None", "score": 0.8861155, "raw_content": null}, {"url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/davidglennsmith", "title": "David Smith - Quality Confidential Inc. - LinkedIn", "content": "David Smith
Global Talent Acquisition Leader | Driving Recruitment Strategy & Organizational Growth in Pharma & Biotech | Executive Search | Data Driven
Cary
500 connections, 29609 followers


About
•	Dynamic and results-oriented talent acquisition leader with experience designing and executing recruitment strategies to enhance speed, account for volume, simplify complexity and ensure quality of hire
•	Assemble and develop talented recruiting teams driving success through defined processes in a culture of coaching and feedback to support team development
•	Effectively collaborate with HR, leadership, and key internal and external stakeholders at all levels to drive talent acquisition initiatives that align with organizational goals
•	Adept at building strong, trustworthy relationships with executives and stakeholders by providing valuable insights on talent landscape and assisting decision-making processes with reliable and consistent end-to-end recruitment data
•	Leverages talent intelligence to predict candidate shortages and create talent pipelines to reduce risk to the business
•	More than 10 years providing direct HR oversight ensuring legal and compliant hiring practices, and conducting periodic audits
•	Candidate marketing expert using a multi-channel approach to drive candidate engagement for both specific skills/jobs and broader focus on hiring as a whole – a practice that works doesn’t always have to be time consuming and expensive.


Experience
Principal Consultant, Human Resources
[Quality Confidential Inc.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/quality-confidential-inc/)  
April 2025 - Present
Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill Area
Key Responsibilities:
•	Policy Review & Assessment: Critically analyze existing HR and Talent Acquisition policies to ensure alignment with legal requirements, industry best practices, and organizational culture
•	Policy Development & Implementation: Design and create new, comprehensive HR and Talent Acquisition policies that address specific organizational needs, promote fairness, and mitigate risk
•	Talent Acquisition: Source, screen, hire, onboard all employees and contractors
•	Workflow Analysis & Optimization: Conduct thorough assessments of current HR and Talent Acquisition workflows, identifying inefficiencies, redundancies, and areas for improvement
•	Solution Design & Recommendation: Develop and present clear, actionable recommendations for streamlining workflows, leveraging technology where appropriate, and enhancing overall operational effectiveness
•	Stakeholder Collaboration: Partner effectively with the CEO, business stakeholders, and legal counsel to ensure alignment and buy-in for policy and workflow changes


Education
Stephen F. Austin State University
BS, Chemistry
1995 - 1999

There are 30+ professionals named "Kurro", who use LinkedIn to exchange information, ideas, and opportunities.", "score": 0.51822984, "raw_content": null}, {"url": "https://github.com/business4s/workflows4s", "title": "GitHub - business4s/workflows4s: Simple, Composable, Business-oriented ...", "content": "Workflows4s is a library that helps in building long-running stateful processes sometimes called workflows. It tries to merge Temporal's execution model, BMPN rendering and native event-sourcing while removing the most of the magic from the solution.", "score": 0.48016238, "raw_content": null}, {"url": "https://id.linkedin.com/in/kurro-2a36b0322", "title": "Kurro _ - Gambir, Jakarta Raya, Indonesia | Profil Profesional | LinkedIn", "content": "-- · Lokasi: 11430 · Lihat profil Kurro _ di LinkedIn, komunitas profesional yang terdiri dari 1 miliar anggota.", "score": 0.4450718, "raw_content": null}]
